alert.note: Alert for Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Southeast Providence; Washington (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued January 09 at 4:58AM EST until January 10 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...One to two feet of inundation above ground level possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (5.5 to 8.5 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Southern Bristol County. In Rhode Island, Southeast Providence, Eastern Kent, Bristol, Washington and Newport Counties. * WHEN...From late tonight through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding can be expected across low-lying areas of Newport, Middletown and Portsmouth. Several immediate coastal roads will be impassable for a few hours around time of high tide. Minor beach erosion on the south side of Newport is possible. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Southeast Providence; Washington
